title: São Tiago (Capela de)
body: The chapel of São Tiago in the parish of Canhas is one of the oldest in the diocese, and according to Gaspar Frutuoso, it was João Gonçalves Zargo himself who designed and indicated the place for its construction. It was there that the parish was established when it was created around 1577. For other circumstances related to this chapel, we refer the reader to the article that deals with the parish of Canhas.

Gaspar Frutuoso: Referred to the chapel of São Tiago
